json.name: Kari Theory
json.description: KARI THEORY- is a Resto-Bar serving Traditional South Indian Street Food with modern cooking & presenting techniques paired with the Finest Drinks & Blends, which will take your gastronomical journey to the destinations where you have not been before and delight you with every element of it.
json.address: No. 2, Gangadhar Chetty Road, Sivanchetty Layout Ulsoor, Bengaluru 560042 India

addressObj.street1: No. 2, Gangadhar Chetty Road, Sivanchetty Layout

json.rankingString: #8 of 10,588 places to eat in Bengaluru

json.name: Zarf - The Indian Kitchen
json.description: Embark on a culinary voyage where each dish tells a story that resonates with depth and its complex yet seamless art of cooking. In a world where flavors become narratives and ingredients transform into characters, our restaurant invites you to experience gastronomic alchemy—a symphony of tastes that goes beyond the surface, delving into the profound depths of culinary mastery. Our chefs, akin to skilled craftsmen, prepare each dish with an understanding that surpasses the ordinary. It's not just about flavors; it's about the intricate dance of spices, the nuanced layering of textures and the harmonious balance of contrasting elements that elevate each bite to a sensorial masterpiece. Our commitment to culinary depth extends beyond the plate; it is a connection to culture and tradition. Each dish is a bridge to India’s heritage, an invitation to explore the roots of a cuisine that has evolved through time, carrying with it the stories of generations.

json.name: Karavalli @ Taj
json.description: Karavalli an iconic restaurant located at Vivanta Bengaluru Residency Road. Since inception in 1990, Karavalli has grown to be an institution when it comes to South west coast flavours. Modelled on a traditional Mangalorean bungalow, and surrounded by lush tamarind trees, the restaurant is inspired by the architecture of coastal South India. Ingredients from the coast, such as cloves, cinnamon, pepper, home grown chillies and only the freshest vegetables and finest meats make it to the menu. The chef and team have painstakingly preserved India’s most refined culinary traditions from our rich heritage by restoring age old recipes, decades of researching meeting with locals and recreating forgotten flavours of a glorious bygone era.
json.address: 66 Residency Rd The Gateway Hotel, Bengaluru 560025 India
json.rankingString: #9 of 10,588 places to eat in Bengaluru

json.name: Byg Brewski Brewing Company
json.description: Byg Brewski Brewing Company, Asia's largest premium brewpub, offers five experience zones, array of home-made craft Beers and a eclectic cuisine with combines both International and Local cuisines to suit every palate. Large open outdoor, adorned with lush greenery, water body combining nature's five elements namely earth, water, fire, metal, making this an opulent experience. Live music, no mobile zone, table games and many activities to participate in.

json.name: Blue Terrain
json.description: Blue Terrain is an evening outdoor dining restaurant and bar that offers customers a mix of classic and contemporary dining experiences along the poolside under the star-lit sky. Blue Terrain is known for hosting corporate gatherings in the Outer Ring Road area, in addition to being the ideal destination for couples and casual diners. The outlet has a one-of-a-kind menu for consumers, offering a variety of Fondues, Flambes, Sharing Plates, one-pot wonders, and other dishes to enhance the user experience. Blue Terrain has it all covered, from intimate proposals to social celebrations, with a variety of unique dining options and setups
json.address: Outer Ring Road Rooftop, Novotel Bengaluru Outer Ring Road, Opp. RMZ Ecospace Business Park, Bengaluru 560103 India

json.name: Neo Kitchen
json.description: Neo Kitchen is located at Hilton Bengaluru Embassy Manyata Business Park and is a contemporary food theater that elevates your culinary experience with its world on your platter concept. This all-day dining restaurant brings together cuisines from Indonesia, Vietnam, Singapore, and India, with signature meat offerings prepared a la minute in the Josper oven by creative chefs. Featuring culinary islands and private and semi-private seating enclaves, Neo Kitchen combines theatrical cooking with elegant dining. Guests can enjoy live cooking stations for breakfast, indulgent Saturday lunch buffets, or luxurious dinner experiences. From business breakfasts to relaxed weekend buffets, each meal is thoughtfully crafted to delight every palate, making Neo Kitchen a top choice for locals, hotel guests, and travelers seeking premium dining in North Bengaluru.

json.name: Loya
json.description: LOYA is a grand feast, which leads you on an immersive journey across the vivid north. From the foothills of the Himalayas to the flat terrain of Punjab, to snow-laden Kashmir, Loya is a confluence of flavour, passion and influence, all culminating exquisitely on your plate. Our search for the authentic and the long-preserved dishes resulted in a gathering of the North’s most cherished recipes. They spotlight the inherent uniqueness and theatrics of time-honoured cooking techniques of the North - the drama of “dhungar” or smoking, the aromatics of “baghar”, in which spices are tempered in hot oil, “dum”, the richness of slow-cooking and the energetic pounding of spices by hand. Loya offers the warmth and comfort of the past intersecting with the energy of today. A place where timeless techniques, undiscovered culinary traditions and heirloom ingredients are proudly showcased. Loya welcomes guests above the age of 08 years only.

json.name: 24@43 Coffee Shop
json.description: Enjoy all-day dining at 24@43 at The Oterra, Bengaluru, as this Internationally-inspired restaurant offers the perfect ambience for breakfast, lunch, dinner and Sunday brunch. Serving both Indian and western cuisines along with a variety of cocktails. It consists of an a-la-carte menu, scrumptious buffets, and an expansive Sunday brunch.

json.name: Time Traveller
json.description: Time Traveller offers an eclectic buffet & an a la carte menu with dishes from across the globe. The buffet for lunch & dinner features over 12 salads, soup selections, 18 main course dishes & over a dozen desserts. Some of the dishes featured in the menu span from Greece, Mexico, The Orient, Europe, Morocco… etc all. Our live counter is a must try!

json.description: Sample worldly flavors at Nook, our all-day restaurant in Marathahalli-Sarjapur, with a menu including Continental, Chinese, Indian and other cuisines. Our dining spot serves tasty meals throughout the week and a special à la carte menu on weekends.
